Start: ^I was an idiot to let you in there. You’re a Droid, you can never really understand what it’s like to lose someone, let alone having to see them transformed into something where they are completely unrecognisable.
next1: ^We tried to make the last of their existence dignified, peaceful, and finally they were actually something that didn’t disgust us completely when we looked at them.
next2: ^You’ve ruined all of that. Get out.
